resources.string: Please select which endpoint you\'d like to transfer to:
Please select which file you\'d like to transfer:
This app was developed by Zachary Skluzacek with the permission
Globus is a data transfer and storage service, but this app helps you transfer files between your computer and another.
What do I do on here?
- First, you select the endpoint you\'d like to transfer files to.
- Second, you select the file you\'d like to transfer.
- Third, you watch as your file is successfully copied to the new location!

This app works using the Globus Transfer/Authentication API, and a custom backend installed on your computer. Through the magic of the cloud, it takes your files and copies them to a new location, but only if you have access.
Sorry, but your transfer failed. Please try again!
